QuestData.Title: Journey to the Timeless Isle
QuestData.Description: The bronze dragonflight has discovered a most unusual pandaren phenomenon, $c. Emerging from the mists, far off the coast of the Jade Forest - an island that was lost in time!$b$bIt is a dangerous place, perhaps the most perilous in all of Pandaria. But we are determined to unravel its mysteries.$b$bHere, take this timepiece. A single click will whisk you to the island. Get yourself established, and speak with Watcher Lara. She will guide you to our chief investigator.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Watcher Lara on the Timeless Isle, off the coast of the Jade Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Watcher Lara on the Timeless Isle, off the coast of the Jade Forest.
